amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 116-33 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 10, 11, 13, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24, 25, 27, and 28.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 116-330 as en bloc No. 1: 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 10, 11, 13, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24, 25, 27, and 28, which appears on pages H9989-H9991 of the Congressional Record of December 10, 2019.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Case amendments (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 166 (Roll no. 660).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Case.
